name: D game
description:
‘D game’ is a point and click ‘game’ about turning off monitors and catching some sun… or not!

This is my 3rd solo ‘gamedev’ try. I’m an artist.  
bitsandcrafts.com | Twitter | Twitch

#madewithfungus in 1 week for Tigerj(am) #2 2019 with the theme ‘The Hero’s Journey’. Thank you TigerJ. Twitter | Twitch

This ‘game’ would not be possible without the love, motivation and talent of:

MUSIC by:
DRONEHANDS Twitter| Twitch
ECHO_LOCATIONS Twitter | Twitch
DEVOLTA Twitter | Twitch

SFX by: 
DEVOLTA Twitter | Twitch
LUSTY_BARD Twitter | Twitch
and a some sfx from freesound.org

BRAINSTORM and SUPPORT: 
SATANISYOURCOUSIN | BLENDER_TOMMY1441 | BINARYUNIT aka ||Ds|


Guys! Thank you so much. ❤... and Thank YOU for playing. 
Enjoy the ☼

PS: Added a version 2 with more mouse click hints. Adding and retouching a few  more stuff later. Sorry.
